features.headline: Network Features
features.subheadline: Built for performance, reliability, and security

items.title: BGP Multihoming
items.description: Fully redundant network with automatic failover. Multiple upstream providers ensure your services stay online even if one carrier experiences issues.

items.title: DDoS Protection
items.description: Advanced DDoS mitigation included with all services. Real-time threat detection and automatic mitigation keeps your services protected 24/7.

items.title: Low Latency
items.description: Strategic peering and optimal routing ensures low latency to major US cities. Perfect for gaming, streaming, and real-time applications.

items.title: Unmetered Bandwidth
items.description: True unmetered bandwidth on 1Gbps ports. No surprise overage charges or traffic limits. Use as much bandwidth as you need.

items.title: IPv4 & IPv6
items.description: Native dual-stack support with both IPv4 and IPv6 connectivity. Multiple IPs available with instant provisioning.

items.title: 99.99% SLA
items.description: Guaranteed network availability backed by SLA. Built with redundancy at every level to ensure maximum uptime.
